wordpressPage.content:
Seahouses Community – Farne Islands – Website

The Seahouses community offer a variety of accommodation including some larger places available to hire at a very reasonable cost. The setting of their centre looks beautiful from their website.

Well worth a look for a more exotic youth residential!

Scout Activity Centre (Open to other groups) – Hawkhirst – Website

Hawkhirst is situated on the edge of Kielder Water set in 70 acres of coniferous forest within Kielder Forest, a magnet for water sports enthusiasts from the UK and beyond  offering  not only a range of exciting water-based activities, but also many land-based activities perfect for any type of group. Hawkhirst has a range of lodges and is able to cater for your group, as well as extensive camping grounds.

Allenheads Lodge – North Pennines – Website

Allenheads lodge is situated in the North Pennines, and has 24 beds in four separate dormitories, is fully central heated, with individual toilet and showers, and has a large kitchen and dining room. Allenheads can also offer various activities such as kayaking, gorge walking and more. All information regarding the lodge can be found on their website.

Kingswood Dukeshouse Wood – Northumberland – Website

The 18 acre activity park in an area of unspoilt countryside houses exciting adventure activities such as zipwire, outdoor laser, Jacob’s ladder, an outdoor climbing and abseiling tower. When the weather is not so favourable, the centre also has a 8000 sq ft all weather barn, housing indoor climbing, a laser arena and computer lab facilities.
